title: ShelfShare
description: A platform for book lovers to trade books with each other. Users can create an account, add books to their collection, and trade books with other users.
stack: Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, Redux, NextAuth, Shadcn UI, Tailwind CSS

title: Career.io
description: A platform for career seekers to find job opportunities. Users can create an account, search for jobs, and apply for jobs.
stack: Next.js, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, JWT, Redux, Shadcn UI

title: Daily Drafts
description: Explore insightful blogs, write your own, and be a part of an ever-growing community of thinkers.
stack: React, MongoDB, Express, Node.js, TailwindCSS, Firebase Authentication
